CompanyName.label: Company Name
CompanyName.value: LATAM Airlines Group S.A. American Depositary Shares (each representing two thousand (2,000) shares of Common Stock)

Address.label: Address
Address.value: AVENIDA PRESIDENTE RIESCO 5711,20TH FLOOR, SANTIAGO, Chile

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: LATAM Airlines Group SA operates as a passenger airline group. Geographically, the company operates in Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Ecuador, and Peru, along with international operations within Latin America and to Europe, the US, and the Caribbean. The firm generates its revenue from transporting passengers and cargo.
